196171.<speed=0>\n予期せぬエラーが 発生しました。\n時間をおいて 再度 お:
<speed=0>I'm afraid an unexpected error has occurred.
Please give it some time and try again.<end>

196172.「真夜中プリズランは <%nM_game_end_m>月<%nM_game_en:
The Midnight Prison Run runs until
<%nM_game_end_m>Monday <%nM_game_end_d>, so
come back...<end>

196173.「プリズランポイントの交換期間は\n <%nM_trade_end_m>月<%n:
The Prizelan point redemption period is
<%nM_trade_end_m> month <%nM_trade_end_d>
day... Please note that...<end>

196177.「あなたは パーティを組んでるから\n パーティメンバーと一緒に 参加してもらう:
You're in a party, so if you'd like to join with your party members... Just have the party leader contact me and let me know
you're coming. And then you'll receive an invitation to the Midnight Prizefighter from the party leader.

196178.「残念だけど 真夜中プリズランの開催期間は\n 終わってしまったの。\n 機会が:
I'm sorry, but the Midnight Prizefighter is
no longer in session. If you get a chance,
please come back and play...<bw_break>

196180.<speed=0>\n現在 入場制限のため あと<%nB_penalty>分\n:
<speed=0>Due to admission restrictions, you will not
be able to participate in the Midnight Prize-
Run for another <%nB_penalty>...<end>

196181.「真夜中プリズランは ８人の冒険者たちが\n 追跡チーム３人と 逃走チーム５人に:
In Midnight Prison Run, eight adventurers are divided into three pursuit teams and five escape teams. The chase team must catch all
five members of the escape team within the time limit... The escape team has until the end of the hour...

196182.「参加者は 皆 あなたと同じ冒険者。\n 『自動で探す』と『パーティを選ぶ』で\:
All the participants are just like you... Use Auto-find and Pick a Party to find people to play with... Auto-find lets you find your own
party members and other adventurers to play with. Choose a Party lets you choose a party to play with. This one's for when you're just
playing with people you know. Whichever way you choose to play, we'll assign you a team.

196183.「追跡チームは 逃走チームに近づいて \n <convenience>で ハンド:
The pursuit team is closing in on the getaway team And you're going to fly your hands out there and you're going to catch him. How many hands do you have? If you run out, you won't be
able to catch anyone for a while. You'll have to wait until it recovers automatically. If you take the Catching Hand, you can increase
your hand count by three. It also restores your hand count. The maximum number of hands you can have is 10. If you take more than
that, you will recover. The catcher's hand disappears when the fleeing team touches it. Whichever team finds it, it must be taken
immediately. When the Catching Hand appears, it will appear on the map, and you will see...

196187.「何について 説明する？\n<select_se_off>\n遊び方について\n:
What do you want to talk about?
<select_se_off>
How to play
About Matching
About Hand
About Prison Rock
About the Helpful Box
About Warp Wing
About Prizelan Points
About Uzukis
<select_end><break>

196191.「真夜中プリズランで 遊ぶのね？\n その前に プリズランの手引きを\n 受けて:
We're going to play Prison Run at midnight, aren't we? But first, I'm gonna need you to take the Prizefighter's Guide, if that's
okay.

196276.「他にも何か 説明が必要かしら？\n<select_se_off>\n遊び方につ:
Is there anything else I need to explain?
<select_se_off>
How to play
About Matching
About Hand
About Prison Rock
About the Helpful Box
About Warp Wing
About Prizelan Points
About Uzukis
<select_end><break>

196963.「あら……ごめんなさい。真夜中プリズランの\n 開催期間は たった今 終わってし:
Oh, my... Sorry... The Midnight Prizefighter
has just ended. If you get a chance, please
play again...<end>

196965.「プリズランの手引きを 受けるのね？\n<yesno><break>:
You're going to be guided by the Prizelan,
aren't you?<yesno><break>

196966.「そう……残念だわ。\n プリズランの手引きを 受けたくなったら\n いつでも:
So... Remaining... If you ever want to take
the Prisoner's Guide, just let me know and
I'll...

196967.「そうこなくっちゃ！\n それじゃ さっそく始めるわね。:
That's what I'm talking about! Okay, let's
get started...

199751.「一緒に遊ぶ仲間を どうやって決めるのかしら？\n<select_se_off>:
How do they decide who to play with?
<select_se_off>
Automatic search
Select a party
<select_end><close>

199752.「４人で パーティを組んでいれば 一緒に遊ぶ\n もうひとつのパーティが 選べる:
If you have a party of four, you can choose another party to play with... But you won't get any Prisoner Points. Is that okay with
you?

200085.「逃走チームは 仲間が捕まってしまったら\n プリズンロックに ５回 アタックし:
If your getaway team gets caught, you'll have to tackle Prison Rock five times to get him out. You can do this by... Approach Prison
Rock.Press... In addition to attacking the Prison Key, you can also break one of the locks on the Prison Lock by touching it. The fifth
lock, however, cannot be destroyed by the Prison Key, so the last thing you need to do is attack Prison Lock directly. The Prison
Key disappears when it's touched by the pursuing team. So, whichever team finds it, take it immediately. When the Prison Key
appears, it'll show up on the map so you can see...

200086.「お助けボックスは 追跡チーム専用と\n 逃走チーム専用のものを 用意しているわ:
We have two help boxes, one for the chase team and one for the escape team. You can't take the helper box that belongs to the other
team, so be careful... Each helper box contains a special item, a clairvoyant, that will tell you where the other team is on the
map.If you hold it down, it'll affect everyone on your team. If you use it right, it can give your team a huge advantage... But as powerful
as clairvoyance is... it doesn't last long. As soon as you use it, you'll see the map...

200087.「ワープウィングは 触れると 一瞬で\n 別の場所に ワープできちゃうアイテムよ:
The Warp Wing is a device that allows you to warp to another location in the blink of an eye... You can see where you're warping to on
the map... It can be used by either team, so it's useful for both pursuit and escape. Use it to your advantage and run like the wind
through the city!

200088.「真夜中プリズランで 遊ぶと\n 勝ち負けに かかわらず\n プリズランポイント:
If you play the Midnight Prizefighter, whether you win or lose, you'll earn Prizefighter points. And if you do well,
you'll be rewarded with extra points... If you choose to play as a party, you will not receive any Prisoner Points. Once you've
earned your Prisoner Points, you can exchange them for cool prizes. However, the exchange period is limited... You can redeem your
Prisoner Points on <%nM_trade_end_m>days of the month... Once that period is over, your Prisoner Points will be gone, so don't forget
to exchange them...

200089.「わたしは こう見えて 伝統文化の研究者なの。\n 最近 はやりの 仮装メイク術:
I'm a student of traditional culture... I'm also very interested in the recent popularity of masquerade makeup as a new culture. I'm a
researcher, which is why I decided to include masquerade makeup in the Midnight Prizelan. I've always loved making and wearing
costumes, so I started out with a lot of different outfits. But lately, I've been wearing this... After all, it's good for
catching what you find... After Rango, I'm going to capture that ghost make-up artist and make him my henchman! And I'll have to do
something about that gargoyle-wearing sister of mine who's always babbling about treasure... But I can't believe you're going
to play with me in my costume. I'm getting an itch just thinking about it.

200562.「そう……残念だわ。\n 気が変わったら また 来てちょうだいね。:
So... Stay... If you change your mind, you
can come back...

250518.「今回のプリズランで 遊んだ戦績よ。\n<break>: I've been playing in the Prison Run...<break>

250532.「真夜中プリズランは ８人の冒険者たちが\n 追跡チーム３人と 逃走チーム５人に:
In Midnight Prison Run, eight adventurers are divided into three pursuit teams and five escape teams. The chase team must catch all
five members of the escape team within the time limit... The escape team has until the end of the hour...

250533.「参加者は 皆 あなたと同じ冒険者。\n 『自動で探す』と『パーティを選ぶ』で\:
All the participants are just like you... Use Auto-find and Pick a Party to find people to play with... Auto-find lets you find your own
party members and other adventurers to play with. Choose a Party lets you choose a party to play with. This one's for when you're just
playing with people you know. Whichever way you choose to play, we'll assign you a team.

250534.「追跡チームは 逃走チームに近づいて \n <convenience>で ハンド:
The pursuit team is closing in on the getaway team And you're going to fly your hands out there and you're going to catch him. How many hands do you have? If you run out, you won't be
able to catch anyone for a while. You'll have to wait until it recovers automatically. If you take the Catching Hand, you can increase
your hand count by three. It also restores your hand count. The maximum number of hands you can have is 10. If you take more than
that, you will recover. The catcher's hand disappears when the fleeing team touches it. Whichever team finds it, it must be taken
immediately. When the Catching Hand appears, it will appear on the map, and you will see...

250535.「逃走チームは 仲間が捕まってしまったら\n プリズンロックに 何度か アタック:
If you're on a getaway team and one of your teammates gets caught, you'll have to make a few passes at Prison Rock to get him out. You
can do this by... Approach Prison Rock.Press... In addition to attacking, you can destroy one of the locks on the Prison Lock by touching the Prison Key. The last lock,
however, cannot be destroyed by the Prison Key, so the last lock must be destroyed by directly attacking the Prison Lock. The
Prison Key disappears when it's touched by the pursuing team. So, whichever team finds it, take it immediately. When the Prison Key
appears, it'll show up on the map so you can see...

250536.「お助けボックスは 追跡チーム専用と\n 逃走チーム専用のものを 用意しているわ:
We have two help boxes, one for the chase team and one for the escape team. Be careful, you can't take the helper box that belongs to
the other team. The chase team will have a searchlight, which, when used, will enlarge the fugitive's body, making it easier to
locate him. The getaway team has a clairvoyant that will display the location of the pursuer on a map for a period of time.
Both of which, if used properly, can give your team a huge advantage.Press and hold. Use it!

250537.「ワープウィングは 触れると 一瞬で\n 別の場所に ワープできちゃうアイテムよ:
The Warp Wing is a device that allows you to warp to another location in the blink of an eye... You can see where you're warping to on
the map... It can be used by either team, so it's useful for both chasing and escaping... Use it to your advantage and run like the
wind through the village!

250538.「真夜中プリズランで 遊ぶと\n 勝ち負けに かかわらず\n プリズランポイント:
When you play the Midnight Prizelan, whether you win or lose, you earn Prizelan points. And you can redeem those Prisoner's Points
for great prizes. And if you're awarded a prize at the results announcement, you'll receive a special reward based on how many
times you've won! Please note, however, that the results of "Choose Your Party" will not be reflected in your Prisoner Points or
rewards... And remember, you can only redeem your Prisoner Points and receive your battle rewards on <%nM_trade_end_m>days of the
month. If you miss this period, you'll lose your Prisoner Points and your battle record, so don't forget to exchange them...

250539.「わたしは こう見えて 伝統文化の研究者なの。\n 最近 はやりの 仮装メイク術:
I'm a student of traditional culture... I'm also very interested in the recent popularity of masquerade makeup as a new culture. I'm a
researcher, which is why I decided to include masquerade makeup in the Midnight Prizelan. I've always loved making and wearing
costumes, so I started out with a lot of different outfits. But lately, I've been wearing this... After all, it's good for
catching what you find... After Rango, I'm going to capture that ghost make-up artist and make him my henchman! And I'll have to do
something about that gargoyle-wearing sister of mine who's always babbling about treasure... But I can't believe you're going
to play with me in my costume. I'm getting an itch just thinking about it.

You're going to be guided by the Prizelan,
aren't you?<yesno><break>
